Reviews.Title: Great picture and plug and play wireless hookup.
Reviews.Author: J. Harrison
Reviews.Content: This camera has a very good picture, even at night and hook-up was very quick and simple. Camera has good range as it is located about 60 yards outside house from network router.I would certainly recommend this camera.

ProductInfo.Features:
1280 x 720 (720p HD) Wireless IP Camera With Dedicated Free iPhone/iPad and Android Apps
Infrared Night Vision to 15 metres and Weatherproof (water and dust proof) to IP67 Rating
Built-in SD card DVR expandable up to 64Gb & Multi-zone Motion Sensor
Motion Triggered Recordings and Alerts by email and FTP
Equipped with long range wireless, infra-red night vision, built-in video recorder, motion sensor, email alerts and more, the camera is an all-in-one home monitoring system with no additional hardware or software needed.
ProductInfo.Name: TriVision Bullet HD 720p Outdoor Weatherproof Home IP Security Camera System, Wireless N, High Definition 1280 x 720 pixel, Built-in DVR Expandable to 64Gb, Free Plug and View App on iPhone, iPad, Android Smart Phone.
